about_the_game:
Step into the gritty and unforgiving streets of Chicago with "Tru or Die Chiraq: Streets of Power," a compelling hood game that puts you in the shoes of a member of the infamous Tru or Die gang. This is your chance to rise to the top in the cutthroat world of Chiraq's street gangs.

Key Features:

Gang Warfare: Immerse yourself in the intense world of Chicago's gangs, where alliances are forged and broken, and power is the ultimate currency. Your decisions will shape the destiny of Tru or Die in the heart of Chiraq.

Co-op Gameplay: Team up with friends or other players online in this co-op experience. Form alliances, strategize, and engage in epic gang battles as you work together to dominate the streets. Each player plays a crucial role in the rise to power.

10 Players Per Server: Enter a massive open-world environment with up to 10 players per server. The competition is fierce as rival gangs vie for control. Only the strongest and smartest will ascend to the top of the hierarchy.

Rise to the Top: Prove your loyalty, showcase your skills, and rise through the ranks of Tru or Die. Take on missions, control territories, and establish your dominance as you climb the ladder of the Chiraq underworld.

Note:
Tru or Die Chiraq: Streets of Power is currently in development, and as a multiplayer co-op experience, players may encounter occasional bugs or unfinished features. The development team is hard at work to deliver a polished and immersive gaming experience. Your feedback and support during this journey are invaluable as we strive to create the ultimate hood game set in the streets of Chicago.

Get ready to navigate the dangerous streets, forge alliances, and claim your place at the top. Do you have what it takes to survive and thrive in the Streets of Power?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8 or 64-bit Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 11 compatible

short_description: Tru Or Die: Chiraq is a third person single/multiplayer roleplaying game.
